name: Land of 10,000 Corns
description:
Land of 10,000 Corns!

In a world full of corn Johnny Biker has been tasked by President Boe Jiden to battle through hordes of zombies in order to eliminate their leader: Big Mama. However the zombie army has obtained a new power from the teralact crystal: they can’t be injured while in the darkness. Our hero Johnny Biker must think on his feet by using matches that burn out after 10 seconds and the lightning that flashes every 10 seconds (that’s two 10 seconds okay) in order to take out his enemies. However, he will have to find a greater weapon before he can take on Big Mama.

Model Attribution and Source Code Here: https://gitlab.com/bweno/ludum-dare-51

Ludum Dare Page Here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/land-of-10000-corns?fbclid=IwAR3Kdnf_zYAg...
